description: This PHP source file provides the implementation for a password change page in a web application. It includes PHP includes for headers and footers, JavaScript code for form validation and interaction, and HTML markup for the password change form, allowing users to input their current password, new password, and verify the new password.

methods.name: getInstanceNum
methods.description: Determines and returns an instance number based on the current logged-in user session.

methods.name: cancel_save
methods.description: Redirects the user to the 'at a glance' page, canceling the password change process.

methods.name: set_config
methods.description: Sends an AJAX request to save the new password configuration and handles success or error responses.

methods.name: next_step
methods.description: Validates password inputs and initiates the password change process by calling set_config.
